parse.title: Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon

wikitext.*:
[[J.R.R. Tolkien]] held the '''Rawlinson and Bosworth Professorship of Anglo-Saxon''' at the [[University of Oxford]] from 1925 to 1945. In this post he was preceded by [[William Craigie]] and succeeded by fellow [[Inklings|Inkling]] [[Charles Leslie Wrenn]]. 

Tolkien's formal letter of application for the Chair was published as [[Letter 7]] in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''.

[[Category:Education]]
